definition: subsequently or soon afterward, often used as sentence connectors, that time, at a specific prior time
details:
adverb
- subsequently or soon afterward, often used as sentence connectors

= synonyms: so
- at that time

- in that case or as a consequence

noun

adjective
- at a specific prior time
